value: Jerk Chicken and pork at the side of the road at Boston Bay, jerk capital of Jamaica
Organic and locally-sourced cuisine at Mockingbird hill

, Bowen Pen, Portland Parish, +1 876 395-5351.  You can choose between en suite Shower, Shower house, or river bathing. You can learn to cook Jamaican foods, learn about medicinal herbs, or help catch seafood. Nearby activities include waterfalls, a large river for rafting or lounging, the Cuna-Cuna Trail Pass, the Maroon Settlement at Mooretown, bananawalks, and others.  Located 15 miles in between the Mountains South of Port Antonio in some of the Caribbean's last virgin forest. USD50 dbl.
address=Muirton Pen P. A. (Long Road) Portland Parish
price=USD32 sgl, USD42 dbl. Minimum two night stay

content= Zion Country is situated on 1 acre of bay front property, beautifully landscaped with flowers, fruit and lumber trees. You can rent a beach cabin and ease into a laid back local lifestyle. Throw a line and catch a fish, snorkel in the turquoise and green-blue waters, see a dolphin or a manatee or just drink a beer with a local. Day trips to local attractions are also available. Lodging prices include breakfast. Lunch, dinner and drinks are available at an extra cost.
